amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for the new construction, purchase, or lease of any building or space in the District of Columbia except where a contract for the construction, purchase, or lease was entered into before the date of the enactment of this Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for the new construction, purchase, or lease of any building or space in the District of Columbia except where a contract for the construction, purchase, or lease was entered into before the date of the enactment of this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gohmert amendment (A056) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 224 (Roll no. 405).
